ANN.summary: Search approximately [K] nearest neighbors from vector index of [Column Name] in [Table Name] with [Query Vector], [Projection] and [Filter]. (for debug)

arguments.name: [N]
arguments.description: total number of documents in the collection, required for BM25 calculation

arguments.name: [avgdl]
arguments.description: average document length, required for BM25 calculation

arguments.name: [df]
arguments.description: Arrow IPC serialized df data for BM25 calculation

arguments.name: [BM25K]
arguments.description: k parameter, used for BM25 calculation

arguments.name: [BM25B]
arguments.description: b parameter, used for BM25 calculation

reply_schema.description: bulk string of scan results. (columns and distance)
